# Feroxi
The Feroxi (fer-ox-i) are a race of humanoid shark-like beings. They are carnivourous in nature with a strong bite force.
## Diet
- Can ONLY eat meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Uses their jaws to do [color=red]piercing[/color] damage, and harder than other species, rivaling Oni. - Their cartilaginous skeleton allows them to [color=#1e90ff]resist blunt force trauma 10% more easily.[/color] - Their adaptation to native environments allows them to [color=#1e90ff]resist the cold 10% more easily.[/color] - [color=#1e90ff]Their biology allow them to breathe water vapour.[/color]
## Drawbacks
- They take [color=#ffa500]10% more Slash damage.[/color] - Gets thirsty 100% faster. That's faster than a Diona! - [color=#ffa500]When thirst falls to "Parched", they will begin to suffocate.[/color] Have water handy! - [color=red]Saline is too salty! It hydrates you much less![/color] - [color=red]Your lungs are unremovable, as theyre integrated with your gills.[/color]
